name: Dice Ten Thousand - Roll Those Lucky Dice - Classic Farkle 10000 Fun!
name_original: Dice Ten Thousand - Roll Those Lucky Dice - Classic Farkle 10000 Fun!
description:
Dice Ten Thousand is the CLASSIC dice game known and loved across the world - now brought to your iPhone and iPad!

Also known as Farkle, 10000 and 5000 this game is known throughout the world!

» Super fun app!
» All time classic card game action!
» iOS8, iPad Air, iPhone 6 and 6 Plus ready!
» Beautiful graphics!
» Cooool sounds!
» Addictive dice fun!!!

Try your luck throwing dice across the green baize in this sparkling app!
